Uses of Class
parallel.distributed.PDBTExecCmd

  • Packages that use PDBTExecCmd 
    Package Description
    graph
    graph package: a collection of classes for representing graphs, hyper-graphs and algorithms operating on such discrete finite structures.
    parallel.distributed
    Extends the basic functionality found in the parallel package over many remote JVMs distributed over a network of machines.

    • Uses of PDBTExecCmd in graph

      Subclasses of PDBTExecCmd in graph 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GraphEdgeSetRemovalExecCmd
      auxilary class (not part of the public API despite the class status) encapsulates request to modify an existing graph by removing a set of links from this graph.

    • Uses of PDBTExecCmd in parallel.distributed

      Subclasses of PDBTExecCmd in parallel.distributed 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PDBTExecNoOpCmd
      no-op command for PDBTExecInited[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects.
      class  PDBTExecOnAllThreadsCmd
      command for PDBTExecInited[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects.
      Fields in parallel.distributed declared as PDBTExecCmd 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private PDBTExecCmd PDBTExecInitedSrv._cmd 
      private PDBTExecCmd PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv._cmd 
      private PDBTExecCmd PDBTExecInitedSrv.PDBTEW2Listener._lastCmdExecuted 
      Methods in parallel.distributed that return PDBTExecCmd 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private PDBTExecCmd PDBTExecInitedSrv.getCmd()
      get the latest command set by a client to be forwarded to workers.
      private PDBTExecCmd PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv.getCmd()
      get the latest command set by a client to be forwarded to workers.
      Methods in parallel.distributed with parameters of type PDBTExecCmd 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv.fwdCmd(PDBTExecCmd cmd)
      only called from setCmd(cmd) method, this method iterates over all connected workers to this server, and submits to each one the command passed in the parameter of this method, then waits for the worker to respond with OKReply before continuing to the next worker.
      private void PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv.PDBTEW2Listener.fwdCmd(PDBTExecCmd o)
      forwards the command object through the socket to the worker, and waits for an OKReply from the worker.
      private void PDBTExecInitedSrv.setCmd(PDBTExecCmd obj)
      sets the command to be forwarded to all connected workers.
      private void PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv.setCmd(PDBTExecCmd obj)
      sets the command to be forwarded to each connected worker, and does the forwarding if appropriate.
      void PDBTExecInitedClt.submitCmd(PDBTExecCmd task)
      same as submitInitCmd(RRObject) except it may be called at any time during a program execution, instructing the server to whom it sends the command, to forward it to all connected workers (and to-be-connected workers) for execution.
